title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       The Civil War Defenses of Washington were a ring of fortifications to protect the city from invasion by the Confederate Army. Now wherever you are in the city, one of these parks is nearby! Start exploring on your own by researching the forts, or join a ranger program for an immersive tour.              Civil War Defenses of Washington   Nineteen fort sites are administered by the National Park Service located on approximately 130 acres.        Things to Do   A list of fun outdoor activities including biking, hiking, outdoor concerts, gardening and so much more!            Error: You have supplied an invalid NPMap ID.
